pageProduct.name: QV Gentle Wash 350G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Gentle cleanser suitable for dry or sensitive skin.
Soap alternative.

Warnings

Avoid eyes.  For external use only.  If lather enters eyes, rinse with clean water.  If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Common Uses

Re-hydrates dry skin.
Cleanse your skin without  leaving it dry and tight with soap free QV Gentle Wash.  Specially prepared for dry or sensitive skin, the innovative formulation maintains skin hydration during cleansing to ensure the skin is left clean and soft - not dry and tight.

Ingredients

Aqua (water), Glycerin, sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Lauryl Betaine, sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, acrylates/C10-30 alkyl acrylate Crosspolymer, styrene/acrylates copolymer, Aminomethyl propanol, methylparaben, propylparaben.

Directions

Use daily in shower or bath.  Apply desired amount of QV Gentle Wash to wet skin and lightly massage.  Rinse and gently pat skin dry. For best results apply QV Skin Lotion or QV Cream immediately after bathing.  For persistent dry or sensitive skin try QV Bath Oil.
